attributes.action: Allow Europeans to celebrate a White Pride week each year in the same spirit as those who enjoy celebrating Black Conciousness, or any other culture or ethnic achievement.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Throughout the world it is natural and healthy for people to celebrate their Cultural identity or achievements. The only people who are denied this privillage are White People, because they are becoming an increasing minority. most Nations or Cultures have things to take pride in as well as any possible regretfulness. This 'Pavlovian knee- jerk response' that people have developed towards any celebration by White people,ie: 'Nationalism = genocide'or Patriotism= Imperialism was deliberately encouraged in the 1940's by extreme elements within the CCCP as a very efficient way of discrediting their opposition within the free world. We in Britain, especially the English are being made to suffer as a result. This trend is reversible; A proud world is a happy world which ever part of it you occupy, no one deserves to be made to carry the burden of guilt for all the worlds problems, especially when it is part of a political agenda.
